com.icfolson.aem.library.api.link.builders

Interface LinkBuilder


  • public interface LinkBuilder
    Builder for creating Link, ImageLink, and NavigationLink objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

    • Method Detail

      • build

        Link build()
        Build a link using the properties of the current builder.
        Returns:
        link

      • buildImageLink

        ImageLink buildImageLink()
        Build an image link using the properties of the current builder. If setImage() was called on the builder, this is the only method that will return a link containing the image source property.
        Returns:
        image link

      • buildNavigationLink

        NavigationLink buildNavigationLink()
        Build a navigation link using the properties of the current builder. If setActive() or addChild() was called on the builder, this is only method that will return a link containing an active state and child links.
        Returns:
        builder

      • addChild

        LinkBuilder addChild(NavigationLink child)
        Add a child link. This is only applicable when building navigation links, returned by calling buildNavigationLink().
        Parameters:
        child - child navigation link instance
        Returns:
        builder

      • addParameter

        LinkBuilder addParameter(String name,
                       String value)
        Add a query parameter.
        Parameters:
        name - parameter name
        value - parameter value
        Returns:
        builder

      • addParameters

        LinkBuilder addParameters(Map<String,String> parameters)
        Add query parameters.
        Parameters:
        parameters - map of parameter names to their values
        Returns:
        builder

      • addParameters

        LinkBuilder addParameters(SetMultimap<String,String> parameters)
        Add query parameters.
        Parameters:
        parameters - map of parameter names to their values
        Returns:
        builder

      • addProperties

        LinkBuilder addProperties(Map<String,String> properties)
        Add properties (map of properties name-value pairs that are stored on the returned link instance).
        Parameters:
        properties - map of properties names to their values
        Returns:
        builder

      • addProperty

        LinkBuilder addProperty(String name,
                      String value)
        Add a property (arbitrary name-value pair stored on the returned link instance).
        Parameters:
        name - property name
        value - property value
        Returns:
        builder

      • addSelector

        LinkBuilder addSelector(String selector)
        Add a selector.
        Parameters:
        selector - selector value
        Returns:
        builder

      • addSelectors

        LinkBuilder addSelectors(List<String> selectors)
        Add selectors.
        Parameters:
        selectors - list of selector values
        Returns:
        builder

      • setActive

        LinkBuilder setActive(boolean isActive)
        Set the active state for the link. This only applies to navigation links returned by calling buildNavigationLink().
        Parameters:
        isActive - active state
        Returns:
        builder

      • setExtension

        LinkBuilder setExtension(String extension)
        Set the extension, without '.'. Defaults to "html" if none is provided.
        Parameters:
        extension - link extension
        Returns:
        builder

      • setExternal

        LinkBuilder setExternal(boolean isExternal)
        Set whether the link should be considered external, i.e. not a valid content path.
        Parameters:
        isExternal - if true, link is marked as external
        Returns:
        builder

      • setHost

        LinkBuilder setHost(String host)
        Set the host. If the host is set, the href of the built link will be absolute rather than relative.
        Parameters:
        host - host name
        Returns:
        builder

      • setImageSource

        LinkBuilder setImageSource(String imageSource)
        Set an image source. This only applies to image links returned by calling buildImageLink().
        Parameters:
        imageSource - image source path
        Returns:
        builder

      • setPort

        LinkBuilder setPort(int port)
        Set the port.
        Parameters:
        port - port number
        Returns:
        builder

      • setSecure

        LinkBuilder setSecure(boolean isSecure)
        Set secure. If true, the returned link will be "https" instead of "http". This only applies when a host name is set.
        Parameters:
        isSecure - secure
        Returns:
        builder

      • setSuffix

        LinkBuilder setSuffix(String suffix)
        Set the suffix.
        Parameters:
        suffix - suffix
        Returns:
        builder

      • setTarget

        LinkBuilder setTarget(String target)
        Set the link target.
        Parameters:
        target - link target
        Returns:
        builder

      • setTitle

        LinkBuilder setTitle(String title)
        Set the link title.
        Parameters:
        title - title
        Returns:
        builder
